name: Cats Run This Café (Rough Draft)
description:
Title: Cats Run This Café

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Puzzle

Unofficial Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

Lead the cats to their goals!

Instructions:

Drag the brown crates to move them and create a path for the cats

Some obstacles are immovable

Click the blue button under the bottom right corner of the game for the best experience (full screen)

Escape key to leave full screen

Special Thanks

CaptainCatSparrow for Materials (50 Free PBR Materials) from Unity Store

Puzzled Wizard for Cafe Prefabs (CoffeeShop Start Pack) from Unity Store

PULSAR BYTES for Low Poly Crates from Unity Store

Omabbuarts Studio for Lowpoly Toon Cat Lite from Unity Store

That Witch Design for Simple Button Set 01 from Unity Store

Game Design Team

Nathan Nguyen – Game Designer and Programmer
